title: ALTER COLUMN
text: The ALTER COLUMN command is used to change the data type of a column in a table.

The following SQL changes the data type of the column named "BirthDate" in 
the "Employees" table to type year:

examples.heading: Example
examples.code:
ALTER TABLE EmployeesALTER COLUMN BirthDate 
  year;

title: DROP COLUMN
text:
The DROP COLUMN command is used to delete a column in an 
existing table.
The following SQL deletes the "ContactName" column from the "Customers" table:

Example

  ALTER TABLE CustomersDROP COLUMN ContactName;
